text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Monday’s coronavirus briefing offered a particularly stark portrait of a president seeming unable to grasp the magnitude of the crisis — and saying little to address the suffering across the country he was elected to lead.
https://t.co/eaE6hVeB6P
